LittleHelper.Conditions.wtGrazed:
-2 penalty to attacks, saves, skill checks and ability checks.
-2 penalty to AC.
LittleHelper.Conditions.wtWounded:
-4 penalty to attacks, saves, skill checks and ability checks.
-4 penalty to AC.
-2 penalty to caster level.
LittleHelper.Conditions.wtCritical:
-6 penalty to attacks, saves, skill checks and ability checks.
-6 penalty to AC.
-4 penalty to caster level.

Taking a standard or move action causes 1 wound point of damage and requires a DC 10 constitution check to not fall unconscious.

A critical character is staggered.
